# my-nvim-setup
nvim을 사용해 보고 싶어서 만든 nvim config 입니다.

## Preview
![Preview](["https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8522d413-c323-4528-a6d4-92f18bbbb268.png"](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/86824224/352809776-8522d413-c323-4528-a6d4-92f18bbbb268.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..m0zoLslC19FV0tacXPiPYpVfuQ_YGMt4jxuWdafTSz4))

## 사용한 플러그인 리스트
- alpha-nvim
- Comment.nvim
- gruvbox.nvim
- indent-blankline.nvim
- lazy.nvim
- lualine.nvim
- mason-lspconfig.nvim
- mason.nvim
- neo-tree.nvim
- nui.nvim
- nvim-lspconfig
- nvim-treesitter
- nvim-ufo
- nvim-web-devicons
- plenary.nvim
- telescope-ui-select.nvim
- telescope.nvim
- nvim-cmp
- conform.nvim
- nvim-autopairs
